issue.title: [Docs] Add version dropdown to the sphinx docs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14189](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14189). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As part of ARROW-13260, we need to add a version dropdown to the sphinx theme layout.

There is working happening for this in the upstream theme (https://github.com/pydata/pydata-sphinx-theme/pull/436), but since that is not yet merged/released, I will "backport" it to our own docs.
